password_min_size: The password must contain at least 8 characters
password_lowercase_req: The password must contain at least a lower case letter
password_uppercase_req: The password must contain at least an upper case letter
password_number_req: The password must contain at least a number
password_specialcaracter_req: The password must contain at least a special character
hero_page_subtitle: Find out if a news is really true or if it is just a fake news. Also contribute with the app filtering news that you know about
create_account_motivation: To start using our application, create your account and start checking the accuracy of the news you find in your daily life, as well as helping other people to know if your news is true.
forgot_text: Insert your email to redefine your password.
discriptionPage1Onboarding: Use our app to find out whether a news article is truthful or not.
discriptionPage2Onboarding: Through the use of our homebrew AI, we can try to predict the truthfulness of a news article written in portuguese.
discriptionPage3Onboarding: All that you have to do now is Sign in and test your news.
enterCodeDiscription: Enter the recovery code we sent to your e-mail
create_text: Enter your name, e-mail address, a password containing at least 8 characters, with a capital letter and a special character and your date of birth
term_of_use: I agree to the Term of Use and Privacy Policy
login_subtext: We are very happy to see you here again !
